
%WORKFLOWNOTICE%

%WORKFLOWSTATEMESSAGE%

Some defect.


	* Set WORKFLOW = DefectWorkflow
	* #Set WORKFLOWHISTORYFORMAT = "	* $state -- $wikiusername, $date"
	* Set WORKFLOWHISTORYFORMAT = "$n$state, $wikiusername, $date"

%WORKFLOWTRANSITION% 


PS: Note, that the tags %<nop>WORKFLOWBUTTON%, %<nop>WORKFLOWNOTICE%, and
%<nop>WORKFLOWSTATEMESSAGE% could be placed in the footer or header, as
well.
